name: Tiefenmesser
description:
FULLSCREEN OR DOWNLOAD RECOMMENDED

A game made for Ludum dare 48, developed by me, myself and I in 48 hours.

Here are some instructions, important as always:

Sink enemy ships using your torpedoes while avoiding being sunk yourself. 

You can place your submarine at three different depths.:

* At surface level your speed is increased but ships will see you and fire their guns at you. 

* At shallow depth the enemy have to use their sonars and hydrophones to detect you and then drop depth charges. The range of their hydrophones depend on the speed of your boat.

* At deeper depths you take less damage from depth charges but lose your ability to see.

Controls:

Space - Launch torpedo

R - (R)aise your depth

F - Go deeper and deeper

E/Q - Zoom out/in (useful for spotting ships)

W/S - Raise/lower speed

A/D - Rudder left/right

M - Mute the music
